description: Data preparation pipeline for traffic accidents classification

steps.name: Feature extraction
steps.description: Extract date components (crash_hour, crash_day_of_week, crash_month) from crash_date

steps.name: Target encoding
steps.description: Binary encoding of crash_type: 0='NO INJURY / DRIVE AWAY', 1='INJURY AND / OR TOW DUE TO CRASH'

steps.name: Missing value handling
steps.description: Drop columns that are entirely empty, drop rows with any missing values

steps.name: Categorical encoding
steps.description: One-hot encoding for categorical variables (traffic_control_device, weather_condition, lighting_condition, first_crash_type, trafficway_type, alignment, roadway_surface_cond, road_defect, prim_contributory_cause)

steps.name: Numeric scaling
steps.description: MinMax scaling applied to numeric features to normalize values between 0 and 1

steps.name: Feature selection
steps.description: Removed highly correlated features and features with low variance

classes.1: INJURY AND / OR TOW DUE TO CRASH
